Text.Page: Find the Free Exodor agent waiting for you at the Iridian Wetlands Platform.
While searching materials for Jelena's cure, <PCNAME> met with Basheek and found out where the villagers were caught.

I've been waiting. I was surprised to hear, but even more surprised to see, that you're all strangers.

You must find materials for Chinitz's cure? Go to the north and you'll find one of our men waiting for you.

He'll help you find the materials."Did you see any other strangers come by?"

No, I haven't.

If any stranger did, it would have been while I was absent.

Good luck.

Please...don't kill me...!

You....you're like him!"I won't hurt you. Tell me where the man went."

He...he went off...over the hill.

Ve..ry quick...

No, I've seen no one.

Maybe your friend went another direction.

The key ingredient of the cure is Iridian Poison Plant and Flexis Talon.

The Iridian Poison Plant is essential to slow down the disease. Bring me that plant and your friend will gain some time.

This should be enough to save your friends.

I'll deliver the plant to our allies. Let's meet at our hideout.

Go to the east and you'll find an abandoned camp.

We don't want to expose ourselves, so be careful and don't get caught by the nagas nearby.
If you want to save your friend, get that Iridian Poison Plant quick.

You weren't followed, were you? Now, all that's left is the Flexis Talon.

Brewing the two ingredients will create a cure that slows down the crystallization.

Be careful, though.

The Flexis Hunters are fierce and dangerous.

Excellent. These aren't easy to find, but you did it!

I'll have these delivered to your friend.

You're not related to these captured people are you?"I am."

You should hurry then.

It'll only be a matter of time before Rogash uses your people for his experiment.

I've heard that Rogash is in a bad mood these days.

This won't be enough for the cure.

Please gather more.

We have to rescue the people of course, but we must make sure that there's a cure for the crystallization.

This is a huge discovery! People at home are still waiting for that cure!

I don't know which is more important.
